scripts.direct:auth:test: node lighthouse-plugin-ecoindex/cli/index.js collect --url https://www.example.com --auth.url https://novagaia.fr/ --auth.user.target '#username' --auth.user.value username --auth.pass.target '#password' --auth.pass.value password
scripts.test: node lighthouse-plugin-ecoindex/cli/index.js collect -u https://novagaia.fr/ -u https://novagaia.fr/a-propos/ -o html && npm run serve
scripts.test:auth: dotenv -- cross-var node lighthouse-plugin-ecoindex/cli/index.js collect -u https://greenit.eco/ -u https://greenit.eco/wp-login.php/ -u https://greenit.eco/wp-admin/plugins.php -u https://greenit.eco/wp-admin/ -u https://greenit.eco/wp-admin/users.php --auth.url %test_url% --auth.user.target '#user_login' --auth.user.value %username_value% --auth.pass.target '#user_pass' --auth.pass.value %password_value% -o html && npm run serve
scripts.test:auth:file: node lighthouse-plugin-ecoindex/cli/index.js collect -j ./auth-input-file.json -o html && npm run serve
